content.title: Hello
content.text:
Constructor is an all-in-one platform for education and research. It is built to cater to the needs of schools, higher education, corporate training, alternative credentials and sports teams.

Goal: To address various downstream tasks in racing image analysis within Constructor SportsTech applications.

Solution: To utilize Nebius AI for pre-training a computer vision foundation model in a self-supervised fashion using an extensive, custom racing dataset.

Result: The model, available on Hugging Face, allows the

highlights.title: 4x leap
highlights.subtitle: in speed over the early version of the framework running on A100

highlights.title: ~500 ms
highlights.subtitle: to process one image during inference
